scripts.test:helm: cypress run -b chrome --env TAGS='@smoke and not @manual' -r mocha-allure-reporter --spec "features/helm/*.feature";
scripts.test:topology: cypress run -b chrome --env TAGS='@smoke and not @manual' -r mocha-allure-reporter --spec "features/topology/*.feature";
scripts.test:pipeline: cypress run -b chrome --env TAGS='@smoke and not @manual' -r mocha-allure-reporter --spec "features/pipelines/*.feature";
scripts.test:knative: cypress run -b chrome --env TAGS='@smoke and not @manual' -r mocha-allure-reporter --spec "features/knative/*.feature";
scripts.test:addFlow: cypress run -b chrome --env TAGS='@regression or @smoke and not @manual' -r mocha-allure-reporter --spec "features/addFlow/*.feature";
scripts.test: npm run clean-results; npm run test:addFlow; npm run test:pipeline; npm run test:knative; npm run test:helm; npm run test:topology
scripts.cypress: npm run clean-results; npm run test:addFlow; npm run merge-report; npm run generate-report
scripts.report: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
